overview: In her third Vivid-Alt picture, award winning director/performer Kimberly Kane brings you her most incendiary wok to date. Live In My Secrets is an extreme hardcore fetish feature from the most primal reaches of Kimberly's psyche. Mixing Super 8mm film and High Definition footage, Ms. Kane delivers a raw glimpse at the hottest exhibitionists of our time.
title: Live in My Secrets
